class.name: Crypto

method.name: decrypt
method.description: Decrypt the given [code]ciphertext[/code] with the provided private [code]key[/code]. [b]Note[/b]: The maximum size of accepted ciphertext is limited by the key size.

method.name: encrypt
method.description: Encrypt the given [code]plaintext[/code] with the provided public [code]key[/code]. [b]Note[/b]: The maximum size of accepted plaintext is limited by the key size.

method.name: generate_random_bytes
method.description: Generates a [PackedByteArray] of cryptographically secure random bytes with given [code]size[/code].

method.name: generate_rsa
method.description: Generates an RSA [CryptoKey] that can be used for creating self-signed certificates and passed to [method StreamPeerSSL.accept_stream].

method.name: generate_self_signed_certificate
sign
method.description: Sign a given [code]hash[/code] of type [code]hash_type[/code] with the provided private [code]key[/code].

method.name: verify
method.description: Verify that a given [code]signature[/code] for [code]hash[/code] of type [code]hash_type[/code] against the provided public [code]key[/code].
